description.en: The Labour Force Report presents the statistics of Malaysian hours worked obtained from the Labour Force Survey (LFS).
description.bm: Laporan Tenaga Buruh membentangkan statistik berkaitan jam bekerja Malaysia yang diperoleh daripada Survei Tenaga Buruh (STB).

variables.name: mean
variables.title_en: Time series: Mean hours worked by Industry
variables.title_bm: Siri masa: Jam berkerja Purata mengikut Kategori Mahir

variables.name: median
variables.title_en: Time series: Median hours worked by Industry
variables.title_bm: Siri masa: Jam berkerja Penengah mengikut Kategori Mahir

en.methodology: The survey which is carried out every month are based on the guidelines and recommendations of the International Labour Organization (ILO) with reference to the Surveys of Economically Active Population, Employment, Unemployment and Underemployment: An ILO Manual on Concepts and Methods.
en.caveat: The time series for 2010–2021 presented the statistics hours worked by demography and socioeconomic levels. These data refer to the total number of hours worked during the reference period.

bm.methodology: Survei yang dijalankan setiap bulan adalah berdasarkan garis panduan dan syor International Labour Organization (ILO) dengan merujuk kepada Surveys of Economically Active Population, Employment, Unemployment and Underemployment: An ILO Manual on Concepts and Methods.
bm.caveat:
Siri masa 2010–2021 memaparkan statistik jam bekerja mengikut tahap demografi dan sosioekonomi. Data tersebut merujuk kepada jumlah bilangan jam bekerja pada minggu rujukan
Publication: Labour Force Survey
